CustomField.formula: CASE( LEFT(WhatId, 3), '001', "Account", 'a1b', "Objective", '006', "Opportunity", 'a0U', "Account Plan", 'a1f', "Territory Plan", '00Q', "Lead", 'a2T', "One-On-One", 'a1d', "Regional Plan", 'a1X', "Divisional Plan", 'a2U', "Project", NULL, "", "Other" )
CustomField.label: Related To: Object Type
